Explorer Profile Network Statistics View real-time network health, station activity, $WXM rewards and more. Claimed Active $WXM Rewards Station owners are rewarded in $WXM for providing data to the WeatherXM Network. The number of weather stations already deployed by users. The number of weather stations that were active during the last day. The number of weather stations manufactured and provisioned in the network. Last Run Last 30 Days $WXM Token View token contract on Etherscan Learn more about our reward mechanism Total Supply Total supply refers to the number of $WXM that have already been created and are either in circulation or locked. Circulating Supply Circulating supply refers to the number of $WXM that are publicly available and circulating in the market. Are you a station manufacturer? Join the ecosystem Last Updated on %s Total Token Metrics Enter Weather 3.0 Deploy your Station Check the Weather Earn $WXM tokens Network Growth Network scale up Network Size Added in last 30 days Weather stations breakdown Deployed Manufactured and provisioned Network health Network uptime Active Stations The network’s effectiveness relies on meaningful, usable data, measured by the Data Quality score. A station’s daily reward is tied to its Data Quality Score, calculated using an open-source algorithm that assesses data quality and provides a confidence level in the data received. Reflects the overall performance and reliability of the network. It consists of data quality, network uptime and number of healthy stations (calculated monthly) to indicate how well the network is functioning and how trustworthy the collected data is. Total $WXM allocated View network stats on Dune Boost Rewards The total amount of $WXM tokens distributed within the network. This includes both claimed tokens (earned and withdrawn) and reserved tokens (earned but not yet withdrawn). The standard $WXM tokens that weather stations earn for consistently providing reliable data. These are regular rewards received by stations on a daily basis for their normal operation. Boost Rewards are extra tokens awarded for special contributions or actions. Reserved Search station name or address Recent Your search returned no results Try searching for something else or check for spelling mistakes. No recent search results Search for station name or address. Most recent results appear here. The search query must be at least 2 characters long. Go to your location Search error My Profile Log in to see your rewards Total Earned Total earned represents the sum of all tokens generated by your weather stations for your current wallet address. Total Claimed Total Claimed reflects the tokens you\'ve successfully claimed and withdrawn into your personal wallet. These are the rewards you\'ve converted from your earned tokens for personal use or other purposes. Allocated Rewards Νο allocated rewards yet! You can also claim your allocated rewards by visiting claim.weatherxm.com from a desktop web browser. Having trouble claiming? Try visiting claim.weatherxm.com from a desktop browser. Join the network Own. Deploy. Earn $WXM tokens. Station must be updated In order for your station to keep operating normally and receive $WXM rewards, you must update your station. Update Station Now Update Station Connecting to Station… Downloading Update… Update download in progress.
Do not switch off the Application! Make sure you don\'t move away from your station as you might lose Bluetooth connection! Installing Update… Connect to Station Download Firmware Update Install Firmware Update Station not in range We couldn\’t reach your station. Please make sure the station is powered up, and you are close enough for the Bluetooth connection to work. Station not yet paired In order to be able to update your station, you must first pair it via Bluetooth. To do so, please follow the instructions below. Tap the \"Pair Device\" button below. Station Updated Your station is updated to the latest Firmware! Update Failed Updating failed, please try again! If the problem persists, please contact our support team at support.weatherxm.com.

Please make sure to mention that you’re facing an Error %s for faster resolution. We strongly recommend you to update for a better station experience!
You will be able to photo verify your station after the update. We highly recommend you update, as this will improve the experience you’ll have with your WeatherXM station! New Update A new update of this app has been released. Please click the button below to go to Play Store and update the app.

After updating please restart the app. Continue without updating Update What\'s New: Password Reset Send Email Email has been sent! If your e-mail is registered with us you will receive instructions for resetting your password. Enter the email associated with your WeatherXM account and we will send you a password reset link. By deleting your account, you will no longer be eligible to gain $WXM rewards, and, you will no longer be able to view your station data in the WeatherXM apps. This will delete the following data:
• Your name.
• Your email address.
• Your station(s) details, their location, and their token rewards history This will not delete:
• The weather data you’ve shared with the network.
• The $WXM rewards you’ve collected. These are yours forever! We do not collect nor store any personal data! If you have any questions regarding your data and the deletion of your account, please contact our support team at support.weatherxm.com. I understand what deleting my WeatherXM account means. Deleting Account… Account Deleted We hate to see you go, and would like to hear why this happened.\n\nWe’d appreciate it if you could share your feedback with us! It will only take 5 minutes and will help us understand what went wrong! Deletion Failed Deletion failed, please try again! If the problem persists, please contact our support team at support.weatherxm.com.

Please make sure to mention that you’re facing an Error %s for faster resolution. Cancel Deletion Retry Deleting Account Validating Password… Take a Short Survey Confirm Password To Proceed Type your password Add Wallet Now Wallet Address is Missing! You haven\’t added a wallet yet. Thus, we will not be able to send you any $WXM rewards. Never use a third party wallet you don’t own, or an exchange’s deposit address. It is highly recommended to use MetaMask, as it is the most compatible wallet. My Wallet Check compatibility here Wallet Compatibility Always make sure you use a wallet you own. If your wallet is not compatible you may not be able to redeem or use WXM rewards!\n\nNot sure if you own a WXM compatible wallet? Check our compatibility guide. Rewards Coming Soon! Station hasn’t received any rewards yet. Sit back and relax, while our systems are validating the station’s location and data. The station should start receiving rewards in the next couple of days. Pro Tip Don’t worry if you see any errors and reward losses for the first 2–3 days after claiming your station. This is expected. Keep calm and wait for the full rewards! Reward Issues Report for %s Issues Data Quality Good job! A solid 100%. Almost perfect! Got %d%%. Data quality is great! Got %d%%. Fix any pending issues to earn more rewards. Data quality is great! Got %d%%. Data quality is OK! Got %d%%. Fix any pending issues to earn more rewards. Data quality is OK! Got %d%%. Data quality is average! Got %d%%. Fix any pending issues to earn more rewards. Data quality is average! Got %d%%. Data quality is low! Got %d%%. Fix any pending issues to earn more rewards. Data quality is low! Got %d%%. Data quality is very low! Got %d%%. Fix any pending issues to earn more rewards. Data quality is very low! Got %d%%. Station lost all rewards because of data quality issues. No information about data quality is available at the moment. Location Quality No location data. Location could not be verified. Station was recently relocated. Station location is verified! Cell Ranking Station ranking is great! Active Boosts Earned +%s $WXM additional rewards from boosts. No active boosts for this station at the moment More reward boosts coming soon. WeatherXM’s goal is to become an open, decentralized ecosystem structured in such a way that network growth, and thereby balanced global weather coverage, is incentivised and every participant (weather station owners and service providers) is fairly and organically rewarded in accordance to the value they contribute to the network.\n\nStation owners are responsible for deploying and maintaining their stations and ensuring the best possible quality of weather data following the Network’s guidelines of deployment. In return, they are rewarded in the Network’s token, called $WXM.\n\nEvery day, our reward algorithm assesses the performance of all weather stations, calculates the Base Reward and any additional rewards originating from various active “Boosts”, and allocates the total reward amount to each user’s connected wallet.\n\nRead more about how our Reward Mechanism works. The Network is as good as its data and we need our data to be meaningful and usable. The Data Quality score is the quantification of this metric. The end goal is to encourage weather station owners to do their best to comply with the Network’s guidelines in order to consistently achieve the best data quality possible.\n\nA weather station’s daily reward is affected by its Data Quality score. To calculate the Data Quality score, we have created an open source algorithm that evaluates the quality of the weather data using various methods. The calculated score indicates the confidence level in the quality of the weather data received from the station.\n\nRead more about how our Quality-of-Data algorithm works. It is important for the Network that a station remains at the same location throughout its lifetime.\n\nThe Proof-of-Location algorithm evaluates location data associated with the station, their accuracy, and consistency. It generates a score which is a confidence indicator about the station’s location.\n\nRead more about how our Proof-of-Location algorithm works. Cell ranking is a measure of a station’s performance relative to others within the same cell - a hexagonal area, covering approximately 5 square kilometers (2 square miles) on the planet.\n\nCell capacity is a parameter that is used to define the maximum number of stations that are eligible for rewards in a specific cell. Every cell has a predefined capacity that depends on its geospatial characteristics*.\n\nEvery station is ranked in its cell daily, based on its reward score and its seniority. As long as the station’s ranking is above the capacity threshold, it will be rewarded, whereas getting below it will lead to zero rewards. For example, in a cell with a max capacity of 5 stations, if a station is ranked 3rd it will get rewarded, but if it is ranked 7th, it won’t receive any rewards.\n\nRead more about how our Cell Capacity algorithm works.\n\n* The cell capacity is currently set to the fixed value of 10 rewardable stations, for every cell. Show Split Reward Split Rewards of this station are split between %d wallets. You can see the percentages below. %s (You) Daily Boost Score Boost tokens earned for %s (UTC) Lost %s $WXM because of data quality score. Claim a Weather Station Select your station type M5 | WiFi D1 | WiFi Pulse | 4G Before you claim your station… Make sure you’ve completed all previous steps: Next up, Station Claiming steps: Check the box contents. Assemble your weather station. Install your weather station following our guidelines. Connect the gateway and get it ready for claiming. Confirm the station’s exact deployment location. Take photos of your station to ensure it meets our deployment guidelines. All Done! You can now enjoy your station and start earning rewards. Pair your station via Bluetooth. Set and Claim Station Claimed Claiming Station… Sit tight, we’re pairing your account with your WeatherXM device! This process could take up to 2 minutes due to the Helium\'s network bandwidth limitations! Sit tight, we’re pairing your account with your WeatherXM gateway! This process could take up to 2 minutes! Your station is claimed under your account!
%s Connection Failed Something went wrong with the connection. Make sure you are near your weather station and retry claiming. If connection still fails, please unpair the station and restart the claiming process. For more details check our troubleshooting guide.

Alternatively, you can contact our support. Setting Up Station Rebooting Station Claiming Station Invalid Location Upload and Claim Claim D1 | WiFi Claim M5 | WiFi Begin Station Claiming Connect the gateway to your WiFi Turn on the M5 gateway and swipe right to the settings screen. Select “Configure WiFi” and then press “Continue” on the screen. Connect your phone to the “WXM M5 XXX” WiFi network. Open your phone’s browser, and navigate to 10.10.0.1. Choose your WiFi network from the list and enter the WiFi password to connect your gateway. Turn on the WG1200 gateway and swipe right to the settings screen. Select “Configure WiFi” and then press “Continue” on the screen. Connect your phone to the “WXM_WG1200” WiFi network. If you’re having difficulty completing this step, make sure you watch the instructional video below! Prepare gateway for claiming The M5 gateway should reboot automatically. After it has rebooted, navigate to the bottom of the settings screen to reveal the QR Code and Serial Number. The WG1200 gateway reboots automatically. After it has rebooted, navigate to the “Claim Device” menu, in the settings. Find the Barcode on the back of your gateway. Press "Scan Barcode" to activate your phone’s camera and scan the barcode automatically. Alternatively, press “Enter S/N manually” to proceed to the next screen and enter your barcode. Scan the gateway’s QR Code that appears in the screen, as seen below. If your gateway is running on an older firmware version, you may have to enter the Serial Number Manually. Enter S/N Manually The QR Code you scanned is invalid. Please try again with a valid QR Code or enter manually. The Barcode you scanned is invalid. Please try again with a valid Barcode or enter manually. Proceed to Next Step Enter gateway Serial Number Enter gateway details Enter the gateway’s Serial Number that appears in the screen, as seen below. Type the barcode located on the back of your WG3000 gateway. Enter the gateway’s Claiming Key and Serial Number. They are located under the QR code. If your gateway is running on an older firmware version, screens may differ. Enter your gateway’s Serial Number 12:34:56:67:78:90:12:34:56:78 P1234567890123456 Enter your gateway’s Claiming Key 123456 Claim Helium Dev EUI Reset your device Reset I’ve reset my device Push the RESET button on the bottom of your WeatherXM device to enable Bluetooth pairing.

This will expire in 5 minutes. After that, you will need to push it again to restart the pairing! Tap the \"I\'ve Reset My Device\" button below. Claim Pulse | 4G Reboot your gateway Press the POWER button on the top of your WeatherXM WG3000 gateway until it turns off. Press the POWER button once again until it turns back on. After reboot, the gateway should display a 6-digit key on the screen. Write it down as you will need to type it in a next step. The station has been rebooted. Type your gateway’s claiming key Upon reboot, the WG3000 gateway will display a 6-digit key on its display after a few minutes. Type it below. Learn more about it here. This action is not reversible! In order to remove your station you need to confirm you are the owner of this account.

Every cell has a predefined capacity that depends on its geospatial characteristics*.\n\nEvery station is ranked in its cell daily, based on its reward score and its seniority. As long as the station’s ranking is above the capacity threshold, it will be rewarded, whereas getting below it will lead to zero rewards. For example, in a cell with a max capacity of 5 stations, if a station is ranked 3rd it will get rewarded, but if it is ranked 7th, it won’t receive any rewards.\n\nRead more about how our Cell Capacity algorithm works.\n\n* The cell capacity is currently set to the fixed value of 10 rewardable stations, for every cell. This score motivates weather station owners to follow guidelines for optimal data quality. A station’s daily reward is tied to its Data Quality, calculated using an open-source algorithm that assesses data quality and provides a confidence level in the data received. About our legal terms We’ve implemented the new Terms of Use and Privacy Policy to better serve you and ensure alignment with best practices and applicable laws. By continuing to use the app for the next 30 days, it is considered that you accept the new terms and privacy policy mentioned above.

By accepting these Terms of Use and Privacy Policy, you agree that they apply to all prior and future interactions with the app. WeatherXM PRO Gain accurate, localized weather forecasts by combining the best data from multiple models and track model performance. Forecast Accuracy Tracking Hyperlocal Weather Forecasts Historical & Current Data Cell forecast Access hyperlocal weather data via API and more coming soon! Choose the perfect plan for your needs and start today! WeatherXM Pro Fine-tune your forecasting! Want more accurate forecasts? Unlock full weather history! Get Hyperlocal Forecasts Take your weather insights to the next level. ALL ABOUT Photo Verification Photo verification ensures your station meets deployment guidelines and can start transmitting valid data. Boost network health with a few photos of your setup! How to take the photos Rotate to landscape and use a wide-angle lens to include as much of the horizon as possible. If your station is in a hard-to-reach place, zoom in just enough to keep the image clear and without overly cropping the surroundings. Ensure at least 1 photo clearly shows the surface where the station is installed. Avoid capturing faces or personal items in any of the photos. Take 4 photos of your station from each cardinal direction: North, East, South, and West. Photo Examples Exit Photo Verification Are you sure you want to exit the Photo Verification process?\n\nYou can always do it later from the station’s settings. At least 2 photos are required.\nExiting now means starting over next time. Upload your photos After taking the photos, tap ‘Upload’ to send them to us for installation evaluation. Your photos are used solely for this purpose.\n\nUploading will run in the background, so feel free to navigate the app while we handle the transfer. Let’s take the first photo! Your photos should look like this NOT like this From the rain gauge looking towards the anemometer Clear view of the horizon (no obstacles) Good distance from the subject From the anemometer looking towards the rain gauge Showing the surface of installation Showing possible obstacle (near wall) From the side, showing the rain gauge on the left and anemometer on the right Clear view of the horizon (no obstacles) Subject is in the middle of the photo From the other side, showing the anemometer on the left and rain gauge on the right Facing bottom up Not showing surrounding area Too close Too far from station No surface of installation Taken during nighttime Not visible obstacles Tilted angle Subject not in the middle Station Photos Add 1 more photo to upload Add 2 more photos to upload Delete this photo? Phone Gallery Add photo This photo is already uploaded, are you sure you want to delete it? Allow WeatherXM to access your camera to continue with Photo Verification. Tap the plus icon to take a photo

Your camera will open Are you sure that your photos follow our guidelines?\nIf you are having second thoughts you can go back and retake any of them! Uploading… Photo upload completed Upload failed. Tap to retry Start Photo Verification To ensure optimal performance and rewards, take a few quick photos of your station’s installation! Thanks for helping us build a healthier network! Here you can see your photos. Once completed, the photos will appear here! Cancel upload Yes, cancel Are you sure you want to cancel the upload and lose the photos?\nYou will need to retake them. We faced an unexpected error while uploading your photos. I have read and accept the Acceptable Use Policy (AUP). Preparing the upload… Almost there! We’ll let you know once everything is ready. Upload started successfully Upload failed to start Thanks for helping us build a healthier network!\n\nOnce uploaded, the photos will appear in your station’s settings. Uploading 1 photo Uploaded 1 photo Upload failed An error occurred Upload cancelled You’ve reached the limit of 6 photos. Remove some photos to add new ones if needed.
